title: My PBE account is working, but I can't login on PBE boards
body: I tried multiple times, it just can't log in, while on the pbe client i can sucesfully log in and play games, but on pbe boards i can't login to give feedback, shows up a message "Sorry, we couldn't find that combination of username, password, and region" i tried multiple times. My account is linked with the pbe account if that could help.

replies.body: Try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) and possibly using a different browser if you can. I'm seeing quite a few topics about this issue this afternoon and starting to wonder if something isn't working correctly on the backend. Let me know if you were able to get in or not!
Same. I can't login to the pbe client.
i cant login to PBE tho
i did it and i cant either
